Get the table of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/goff">GOFF</a> displacements.

This is &#39;const&#39; since it should never be modified by anything except the APIs on this class.

### insert() {#aece3b1b4dd185430b31a472fb0f4be38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t SystemZAsmPrinter::AssociatedDataAreaTable::insert (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Sym, unsigned SlotKind)</>}>
Get the displacement into associated data area (ADA) for a name.

If no displacement is already associated with the name, assign one and return it. 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Sym">The symbol for which the displacement should be returned.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SlotKind">The ADA type.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The displacement of the descriptor into the ADA.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzasmprinter-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzasmprinter-h">SystemZAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzasmprinter-cpp/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemzasmprinter-cpp">SystemZAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.
